title: Ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository providing easy setup and running of large language models locally.

title: Ollama Python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, enabling programmatic interaction with local LLMs.

title: Ollama JS / npm
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models, allowing use within LangChain workflows.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat interface for Ollama with model management, multi-user support, and more.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java library for integrating Ollama models into JVM applications.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama, providing idiomatic Ruby access to local LLMs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built CLI wrapper adding extra commands and utilities for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama-powered code completion and chat into the editor.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset for using Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama, enabling team chats with local LLMs.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up Ollama services.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that uses Ollama models for AI-assisted note-taking and summarization.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node for integrating Ollama into no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template for quick web demos powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama, published as github.com/ollama/ollama/api.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with async APIs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing typed bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.
